channel.title: Santa shop help plz
channel.description:
ok i added santa to my mix of shops i'm pretty sure i did everything right he pops up in the right coords, but when i click 'talk to' he wont trade
here are the codes shops.cfg [code]shop = 42 @whi@SANTAS WORKSHOP 1 1 537 11000 1149 11000 1187 11000 1215 11000 1249 11000 1305 11000 1377 11000 1434 11000 3140 1 4087 11000 4587 11000 7158 1[/code]
and client.java [code]} else if (NPCID == 1552) { // SANTAS WORKSHOP -hellobud PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 42; // SANTAS WORKSHOP[/code]

item.title: Santa shop help plz
item.dc:creator: @hellobud hellobud
item.description:
@hellobud wrote:

i keep getting this error saying

[code]client.java:7647: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable npchandler
location: class server
if ((NPCSlot < 0> :: (NPCSlot >= server.npchandler.npcs.length)

Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecativce for details.
1 error
:: Done!
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

i just kinda played around with the code not really knowing what to do can some1 help?
